item.title: ambulance
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
rush hour traffic
lights blinking red and blue —
an ambulance whizzes by

item.title: spider
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
bright blue dots
glowing in the dark —
radioactive spider

item.title: streaks
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
blazing streaks of light —
drawing beautiful patterns
with long exposure
